name: Ads Inevitable
description:
Backtrace link: https://share.backtrace.io/api/share/goYcf2RPnkigHLqcREuhH2

Developed around the theme of 'Share Knowledge'.

Ads Inevitable puts you in the position of the AI sending content to the social media feed of a person.

Your goal is to balance our their interests so they keep scrolling and get the highest possible score!

Designed & Developed by myself.

Art by Connor Welsh (https://www.artstation.com/leviawocky)
